database.name: VIEW AD_AUDIT_TRAIL_V
database.view: SELECT t.ad_audit_trail_id, t.ad_client_id, t.ad_org_id, t.isactive, t.created, t.createdby, t.updated, t.updatedby, t.ad_table_id, t.record_id, t.record_revision, t.ad_user_id, t.time, t.processtype, t.process_id, t.action, t.ad_column_id, t.old_char, t.new_char, t.old_nchar, t.new_nchar, t.old_number, t.new_number, t.old_date, t.new_date, CASE WHEN t.processtype = 'P' THEN ( SELECT to_char(p.name) FROM ad_process p WHERE p.ad_process_id = t.process_id) WHEN t.processtype = 'W' THEN ( SELECT to_char(t.name) FROM ad_tab t WHERE t.ad_tab_id = t.process_id) WHEN t.processtype = 'X' THEN ( SELECT to_char(f.name) FROM ad_form f WHERE f.ad_form_id = t.process_id) ELSE '**' END AS process_desc FROM ad_audit_trail t
